title: Discogs Record Collection
description: A record collection app using the Discogs API
about: I wanted to create a tool to organize and showcase my vinyl collection. With this app, I can pull data directly from the Discogs API and display details about each record

title: Daniel Sant's Website
description: The official website of Daniel Sant
about: Tasked to build a functional website for pianist/composer Daniel Sant. The goal is to have a platform for his audience to find important information, and is also being expanded to allow for people to view Daniel's sheet music
